dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3137 IH: Biodiesel Tax Credit Extension Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carey (for himself, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Johnson of South Dakota, Mr. Garbarino, Mr. LaHood, and Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the biodiesel fuels credit and the biodiesel mixture credit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Biodiesel Tax Credit Extension Act of 2025.

subsection.header: Extension of biodiesel and renewable diesel credit

paragraph.text: Section 40A(g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2026.
Section 40A of such Code is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: by redesignating subsection (g) (as amended) as subsection (h), and
by inserting after subsection (f) the following new subsection:

subsection.text: In the case of any fuel with respect to which a credit is allowed under section 45Z(a) for any taxable year, the amount determined under this section with respect to such fuel shall be zero.

paragraph.header: Extension of credit for fuels used for taxable purposes

subparagraph.text: Section 6426(c)(6) of such Code is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2026.
Section 6426(c) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: In the case of any fuel with respect to which a credit is allowed under section 45Z(a) for any taxable year, the applicable amount determined under this paragraph (2) with respect to such fuel shall be zero.

paragraph.header: Extension of credit for fuels not used for taxable purposes
paragraph.text: Section 6427(e)(6)(B) of such Code is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2026.

subsection.header: Extension of alcohol fuel credit with respect to second generation biofuel production and coordination with clean fuel production credit

paragraph.header: Coordination with clean fuel production credit
paragraph.text: Section 40(b) of such Code is amended by redesignating paragraph (6) as paragraph (7) and by inserting after paragraph (5) the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Coordination with clean fuel production credit
paragraph.text: No credit shall be determined under this paragraph with respect to fuel with respect to which a credit was allowed under section 45Z(a).
Section 40(b)(7)(J)(i) of such Code (as so redesignated) is amended by striking January 1, 2025 and inserting January 1, 2027.
The amendments made subsections (a) and (b) shall apply to fuel sold or used after December 31, 2024.
The amendments made by subsection (c) shall apply to qualified second generation biofuel (as defined in section 40(b)(6)(C) of such Code) production occurring after December 31, 2024.
